summary: THE VEHICLE EXPERIENCED ENGINE FAILURE FOR THE SECOND TIME.  HE STATED THAT THE FIRST TIME WAS 11/99. THE ENGINE HAD 118,000 MILES.  HE STATES HE ASKED THE MANUFACTURER FOR ASSISTANCE AND THEY DECLINED BECAUSE OF A TECHNICALITY.  HE ALSO STATED THAT THE MANUFACTURE SHOULD REPLACE HIS ENGINE BECAUSE HE SAID THAT WHEN HIS ORIGINAL ENGINE WAS REPLACE THE MECHANIC USED PARTS FROM THE OLD ENGINE.    *NLM
